entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
